Text: Low quality video but high quality information...
@antokz - You find me a high-quality source of any size and in any format, and I'll make a small high-quality .avi, .mkv or whatever.

I am scouting the internet for a hard copy of this program.  It is very rare.  I had to rip it and re-encode it from YouTube.  I would like to get the DVD directly from Discovery Channel.  Will keep you posted if I get it - I will make a high-res copy of it and post here again.

Does anybody know how to get "Dr. G. Medical Examiner" show on Discovery Health (now called Discovery Fit & Health)?? It's not available anywhere it seems. I sure would LOVE to have these (and also the other hot medical documentaries on there)...
